actions.text: Amendment SA 656 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 656 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 167.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 656.
Amendment SA 656 proposed by Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR S6429-6430) To create jobs, provide opportunity, and restore prosperity.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 656 proposed by Senator Daschle.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 656 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 167.

purpose: To create jobs, provide opportunity, and restore prosperity.
